程序包 org.janusgraph.graphdb.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.auth

类 JanusGraphSimpleAuthenticator

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.graphdb.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.auth.JanusGraphAbstractAuthenticator
org.janusgraph.graphdb.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.auth.JanusGraphSimpleAuthenticator
所有已实现的接口:
org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.auth.Authenticator
public class JanusGraphSimpleAuthenticator
extends JanusGraphAbstractAuthenticator
A simple implementation of an Authenticator that uses a Graph instance as a credential store. Management of the credential store can be handled through the CredentialTraversalDsl.

  • 嵌套类概要
